Reviews.Title: “All in all, average hotel for a fair price”
Reviews.Author: Christoph E
Reviews.Content: visited london class spent five days nights hotel hotel offers accessibility due proximity earls court station minutes walking 24h supermarket pubs immediate vicinity acceptable cleanliness personally vermin traps disturbing kitchenette real benefit especially hungry evening selection kitchen utensils available wasnt breakfast choice english breakfast scrambled eggs toast cereals service employees friendly answered question average hotel fair price school trips

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value. Not the ritz but at the price, fantastic.”
